Welcome
This is BluModify app, which protects your devices from battery drain and redundant sharing of the Bluetooth signal.
BluModify app icon
Battery saving
Imagine you go to work listening to your favourite music. You go through mall to buy snacks, stop by in park and end up at work desk. You turn off the earbuds, but Bluetooth is still on and drains your battery.
Icon describing how the Bluetooth is draining the battery.
Be incognito
Active Bluetooth can be tracked and abused from outside. Shopping malls can track your entrances into a shop or someone can abuse its vulnerabilities within close range. Even your own apps can determine location based on Bluetooth or abuse it in many other ways.
Icon describing how the Bluetooth is draining the battery.
What to do?
Turn off the Bluetooth and that is it.\n\nWith BluModify you can set up events, which will turn off the Bluetooth, so you do not have to think about it. The BluModify is event driven, so the battery consumption of the app itself is minimal.
Sleeping Bluetooth icon.
